attributes.action: Force exam boards to reconsider English gcse grade boundaries
attributes.additional_details: The government should liaise with exam boards to force them to reassess the ground boundaries for English gcse courses which have been changed along with a harsh mark scheme beeping implemented despite the fact that the exam papers themselves have remained simmilarly challangeing to those sat by candidates in the past few years this has denied pupils a grade C which is required by most employers and further education establishments putting them at behind when in competition with candidates from previous years.
